Title: Bad quality
Review: Writing it after 4- 5 wash. One of the few top loads with inbuilt heater which is a must if you have kids at your home. It makes absolutely no sound and consume very less power. Features like child loock, anti bacterial wash, hydrolic cover are useful. Wash quality is good but not water saving as they claim. Overall product is good. Loaded with features, most of which are practical. Still , absence of dedicated softner  tray is disappinting. Multiple additional sensors are there but that does...

Title: Highly recommended
Review: Today I've got this delivered so no reviews on how it works but the model and the design is classic and brilliant. The bes thing is it was a surprise for my parents and they liked it.

Title: Worth every penny
Review: The purchase was smooth with the Flipkart. Received my product well on time. The installation was late though the customer service helped in resolving the problem. Its 10 days now using this masterpiece,no breakdown smooth functioning. The built-in heater is a addition which makes this product best in market. All features like power dry,allergn free wash are rare to see in any other washing machines.

Title: Simply awesome
Review: The washing machine performs pretty well, makes the least noise and vibrates only during drying. This model has an inbuilt heater and works really well. The ordinary dry quality is adequate. Coming to the looks, I haven't found a top load washing machine in the market which looks better styled than this model. The price offered by Flipkart at Rs. 24990 is the best rate in the market. I have visited retail outlets as well but the price is nowhere close to what Flipkart is offering. Coming to...
